duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and assign documents to inquiry, prospect and applicant files; ensure all files are complete and that documents are properly identified from submission to decision to mailing.
Field general questions from prospective applicants, families and school officials through phone and email communication.
Prepare items for mailing during admission season with a high level of attention to detail and confidentiality.
Assist in preparing for office-wide events and providing support on the day of events.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED (Bachelor's degree preferred)
